none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2020-06-trembling-hands/extracted/Trembling Hands/02 To_ We Who Know Nothing Of Terror

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on June 08, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
Prepare for complete annihilation. My only complaint is that the untitled piece that closes the first side should have started the first side, but if you need to dig that deep to uncover a critique then....well, you're doing pretty good, kids. I'm pretty sure that this 2012 cassette was a one-off - nine minutes with the sonic subtlety of a flash bang. The power is pure, and the anger is real.  TREMBLING HANDS

seo.title: Trembling Hands - s/t cassette - Terminal Escape
